Uses of Package
com.guardtime.envelope.extending

  • Packages that use com.guardtime.envelope.extending 
    Package Description
    com.guardtime.envelope.extending
    General interfaces and classes to perform signature extending
    com.guardtime.envelope.extending.ksi
    Extending implementation for the KSI signatures
    com.guardtime.envelope.signature
    General classes and interfaces for all possible signature implementations
    com.guardtime.envelope.signature.ksi
    Implementation of the KSI signature
    com.guardtime.envelope.signature.postponed
    Implementation of the delegated signature, to allow postponing of the actual signing
  • Classes in com.guardtime.envelope.extending used by com.guardtime.envelope.extending 
    Class and Description
    ExtendedEnvelope
    Wrapper for a Envelope that has been processed by EnvelopeSignatureExtender.
    ExtendedSignatureContent
    Wrapper for a SignatureContent that has been processed by EnvelopeSignatureExtender.
    ExtendingPolicy
    Extending policy to link signature with a trust anchor.
  • Classes in com.guardtime.envelope.extending used by com.guardtime.envelope.extending.ksi 
    Class and Description
    ExtendingPolicy
    Extending policy to link signature with a trust anchor.
  • Classes in com.guardtime.envelope.extending used by com.guardtime.envelope.signature 
    Class and Description
    ExtendingPolicy
    Extending policy to link signature with a trust anchor.
  • Classes in com.guardtime.envelope.extending used by com.guardtime.envelope.signature.ksi 
    Class and Description
    ExtendingPolicy
    Extending policy to link signature with a trust anchor.
  • Classes in com.guardtime.envelope.extending used by com.guardtime.envelope.signature.postponed 
    Class and Description
    ExtendingPolicy
    Extending policy to link signature with a trust anchor.
